text: If everything in minikube is expected to be ephemeral (see also <https://github.com/kubernetes/minikube/issues/1378>) I can deal with it :disappointed:

<@U0ED3J9G8> re <https://github.com/kubernetes/minikube/issues/1926>, do you know if there's a way to recover an existing stopped minikube when seeing  "Error starting stopped host: IP address never found" ?  I want to avoid deleting my current minikube since it's got some configuration in it right now & and cost time to recreate.
<@U73ADUGRW> i came across this a couple of days ago <https://github.com/kubernetes/minikube/issues/2302>
